item.title: Build Configurable Running Text using NodeMCU + Arduino IDE + P10 Dot Matrix using DMDESP + WEBSOCKET
item.description:
Minesweeper

In this tutorial i will guide you to how to build a Running Text Display using P10 Single Color Dot Matrix and a NodeMCU.

getting started

creating grid

placing bomb

placing number

clearing tiles

adding flag

winning

wrap up
